bibl.title: P. Oxy. LXVI 4527 and the Antonine Plague in the Fayyum.
bibl.note: Replies to: Roger S. BAGNALL, P. Oxy. 4527 and the Antonine Plague in Egypt: Death or Flight?, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 288-292. - "I think the text rather shows that the agricultural economy of Egypt was in deep trouble at the time, which may well be linked to the Antonine plague."
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, P. Oxy. LXVI 4527 and the Antonine Plague in the Fayyum.

Replies to: Roger S. BAGNALL, P. Oxy. 4527 and the Antonine Plague in Egypt: Death or Flight?, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 288-292. - "I think the text rather shows that the agricultural economy of Egypt was in deep trouble at the time, which may well be linked to the Antonine plague."
